mapper.insert: insert into estate_user (id, estate_id, user_general_id, `status`, remark, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{estateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userGeneralId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update estate_user set estate_id = #{estateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_general_id = #{userGeneralId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, estate_id, user_general_id, `status`, remark, create_time, update_time from estate_user
